data.comment: The match is underway in Portland.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Cristian Pavon (LA Galaxy) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 3, Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for LA Galaxy, close to Portland's area.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Ethan Zubak (LA Galaxy) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Portland to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Joseph Dickerson awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Portland are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 7, LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Portland's half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Daniel Steres (LA Galaxy) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 11, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 12, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Bonilla (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
In the minute 15, Goal! Efrain Alvarez gives LA Galaxy a 0-1 lead in Portland.
Great play from Sebastian Lletget to set up the goal.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
In the minute 17, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
Joseph Dickerson signals a Portland throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Portland.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Bill Tuiloma's header is off-target for Portland.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Portland drive upfield and Felipe Mora gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Free kick Portland.
In the minute 30, Portland push upfield but Joseph Dickerson quickly pulls them for offside.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of LA Galaxy.
Portland's Marvin Loria is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, LA Galaxy drives forward and Sebastian Lletget gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 38, Portland to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Portland.
In Portland, Tomas Conechny of Portland is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Portland surge into the attack at Providence Park but Felipe Mora’s header is off-target.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Joseph Dickerson signals a Portland throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Providence Park.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Portland in Portland.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
In the minute 48, Renzo Zambrano is booked for the home team.
In Portland LA Galaxy drive forward through Julian Araujo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's now 0-2 in Portland as Cristian Pavon scores for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 50, Nick DePuy with an assist there.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a Portland throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 56, Sebastian Blanco is on a sub for Tomas Conechny for Portland.
Eryk Williamson is replacing Cristhian Paredes for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 57, Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
The home team have replaced Marvin Loria with Jeremy Ebobisse. This is the third substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Joe Corona gets his shot on target but fails to score for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 58, Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Portland in the half of LA Galaxy.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 62, Julio Cascante (Portland) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
The away team replace Sebastian Lletget with Jonathan Dos Santos.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Julian Araujo (LA Galaxy) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Sebastian Blanco of Portland gets in a strike, but is off target.
Joseph Dickerson awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 66, In Portland LA Galaxy attack through Jonathan Dos Santos. The finish is off target, however.
Portland have a goal kick.
Goal! Portland reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Felipe Mora.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Free kick Portland.
In the minute 69, Portland are coming forward and Andy Polo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Goal! Joe Corona extends LA Galaxy's lead to 1-3.
In the minute 72, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
LA Galaxy make their second substitution with Emil Cuello replacing Efrain Alvarez.
In the minute 75, Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's third substitution at Providence Park with Rolf Feltscher replacing Julian Araujo.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marco Farfan.
Portland's Marco Farfan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 76, Sebastian Blanco (Portland) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Portland to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Felipe Mora for Portland drives towards goal at Providence Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Yimmi Chara is replacing Pablo Bonilla for the home team.
Portland's Yimmi Chara has run offside.
In the minute 80, Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
At Providence Park, Portland are penalized for being offside.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Julio Cascante is back on the pitch.
In the minute 84, Attention is being given to Portland’s Julio Cascante and play has been suspended briefly.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 85, Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for LA Galaxy, close to Portland's area.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Portland are pushing forward but Yimmi Chara's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Yimmi Chara for Portland gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
In the minute 88, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a fourth substitution, with Cameron Dunbar replacing Ethan Zubak.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's fifth substitution at Providence Park with Diego Valeri replacing Renzo Zambrano.
Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Important block from the LA Galaxy defence as Jeremy Ebobisse fires in a strike for Portland.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Cameron Dunbar (LA Galaxy) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Portland's Jeremy Ebobisse gets in a shot but it is blocked by a LA Galaxy defender.
LA Galaxy drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Portland push forward at Providence Park and Felipe Mora gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined LA Galaxy defence.
Corner awarded to Portland.
The match is over. Final score 2-3.
Goal! Diego Valeri pulls one back to make it 2-3.
That's a fine assist from Yimmi Chara.
